description:
Create a program that asks a user to input the length of a side in a square.
Write a function that takes this value and returns the area to be printed.
correct-program:
# Define a function to calculate and return the area of a square def calculate_square_area(side_length): return side_length * side_length
# Ask the user to input the length of a side in a square side_length = float(input("Enter the length of a side in the square: "))
# Call the function to calculate the area of the square area = calculate_square_area(side_length)
# Print the calculated area print("The area of the square with side length "+str(side_length)+" is: "+str(area))
